reviews.title: Nice place
reviews.text: This hotel is very clean, modern & cheerful. Its decor is simplistic in design but elegant in its feel. The staff is very friendly and helpful, but some doesn't speak English very well. So, if you're looking for English speaking hotels, you may run into problems with some not being able to completely understand you.

reviews.title: Nice Rooms but doesn't deliver with activities
reviews.text: We spent a few days here in September, looked forward to using the leisure facilities spoken of on the web site, Unfortunately these facilities are still being built. Nice rooms tho'. Breakfast choice not the greatest but location is close to the main rail station and close to the centre of the city which in itself is a little jewel, Wouldnt rush back as there seems plenty of choice from smaller independent hotels situated nearby.

reviews.title: Nice new hotel, but weirdly room had no desk
reviews.text: Stayed here beginning of September, looked like it was pretty newly opened. Stayed in a suite, had two floors (first time i've had such a big room...). Has some promise, but two quirks: the room had no desk, so was bit useless for working. And there was a toilet downstairs but it didn't have a wash basin, so had to go to the upstairs toilet to wash hands. I would hope these quirks can be sorted by the management., as otherwise was a nice hotel.

reviews.title: 3 star hotel with rooms from a 4 star hotel
reviews.text: Very good and brand new Novotel hotel. Pic's from Executive room 126

We stayed one night on our driving holiday. Our room was beautifully-presented, quiet and comfortable. The corridors and lifts smelt of disinfectant. Parking costs €10/day extra but Internet is free and accessible within the room.
reviews.title: Cery nice place to stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had a good experience at the Novotel Rennes Centre Gare. Very comfortable ultra modern room. The bathroom is stunning and modern. The restaurant was closed while we were there and we did not use the spa facilities. The hotel is very convenient to the train station and they have good private parking behind the hotel. 10 minute walk to the "old city". Hotel staff were often absent from the desk. It was raining through out our visit, an umbrella would have been a welcome sight.
reviews.title: Modern hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Lovely hotel the rooms are clean and very modern, would recommend to anyone wanting to stay in Rennes. If you booked a triple room you get a room that is over two floors! WELL worth the extra money for the extra space.
reviews.title: Best Hotel in Rennes

reviews.text: On the way to our holiday in the south of France we stayed at the Novotel Alma in Rennes which is a less good location than this one if you want to do anything outside the hotel but a better hotel to get onto the main road quickly. The Centre Gare is okay but (i) both lifts were out of action (ii) the hot food at breakfast was not kept topped up so there as a long wait for it to be replenished and (iii) the bed was not the most comfortable I have slept in. It tries to be quite "swishy" but it failed in a number of ways to actually meet the standards of the type of hotel it pretends to be.
reviews.title: Good location but a few negatives

reviews.text: Good location in City. Nice clean, modern Hotel - appears recently renovated. Nice rooms with lovely bathrooms. Parking in yard was 10 euros. Staff were helpful and polite.
reviews.title: Lovely Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Wi-fi in room 322 was no good though - kept dropping out. Also no bathrobes in room.
reviews.title: Quality hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Would certainly stay here again, however. We got a bargain with Accor special offer.
reviews.title: Very good choice for the price

reviews.text: Visited on the final night touring Brittany. The hotel is centrally located in this beautiful city within easy walking to the old city. We had booked two rooms and were given adjacent rooms at the end of a corridor in a private section. The rooms were excellent, beautifully designed and with good views. Tea and coffee was provided. The only negatives are plastic glasses and paper cups, so after one cup of coffee the paper cup was useless. This seemed an unnecessary economy. Forget the bathrobe and provide mug and glass. There was only one bedside table and two shower heads which defied our 4 brains to work out how to operate the larger one. Minor issues though in this lovely hotel with excellent staff.
reviews.title: Pleasant stay at modern clean hotel

reviews.text: I spent two nights on a business trip in Novotel Rennes Centre Gare, and I was pleasantly surprised.
reviews.title: Great location and service

reviews.text: The rooms are very modern and nice, the breakfast was great, the pool/fitness area was open 6am until 11pm and the location is great, especially if you have travelled to Rennes by train.
reviews.title: Allowed us to change our reservation

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I booked a room using the Novotel internet site and booked the reservation as nonrefundable with no change or cancel options. After booking, I realized quickly that I accidentally booked for a week prior to our arrival. Novotel reminded me of the provisions of my reservation and suggested that I could call the hotel directly to see if they would change it. The woman at the hotel was extremely nice and changed the reservation for us.
reviews.title: We liked it a lot !

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is in a great location with lots of restaurants. The staff gave many suggestions for restaurants. One woman recommended a creperie that was excellent and very close to the hotel.
reviews.title: Great base for adventures in Bretagne

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room was excellent and well designed. The baby slept downstairs in the crib and we slept in the loft upstairs. The internet was free and the room was very nice.
reviews.title: Comfortable, great service
